title: Using the assignment operator
description: Use := to create or overwrite fields in the pipeline. This is essential for normalization, enrichment, and building helper fields used later in the query.

examples.name: Example
examples.description: Creates a lower‑cased file name field and a derived boolean field marking suspicious temp‑folder executions.
examples.query:
#event_simpleName=ProcessRollup2
| ImageFileName_lower := lower(ImageFileName)
| suspicious := ImageFileName_lower="*\temp*"
| select([@timestamp, ComputerName, ImageFileName, suspicious])
